description: Certain Tenda products are vulnerable to command injection. This affects Tenda CP7 Tenda CP7<=V11.10.00.2211041403 and Tenda CP3 v.10 Tenda CP3 v.10<=V20220906024_2025 and Tenda IT7-PCS Tenda IT7-PCS<=V2209020914 and Tenda IT7-LCS Tenda IT7-LCS<=V2209020914 and Tenda IT7-PRS Tenda IT7-PRS<=V2209020908.
